The course "Experimentelle Übungen für Signale und Systeme in Prozesswissenschaften" / Signals and Systems Labs will start in week 16. The course can be done in English and/or German as different groups may choose their preferred language. The course script, solutions and concept questions are available in English and German. ). In case you would like to participate but none of those dates and times work for you, please send an email to magnus.axelson-fisk@tu-berlin.de so that we may find a solution.
